charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking along
a mountain trail, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Iris talking to
another Trainer.
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_0200_1: Thanks a bunch! See you again!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_0400_1: I just had a battle with that Trainer!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0401_0600_1:
Yeah! I feel like I understand dragon Pokémon
even better now, thanks to that battle!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0402_0800_1:
Of course! And I learned a lot about my
opponent’s Kingdra, so it was super helpful!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_0900_1:
People say that I’m the girl who knows the hearts
of dragons, but there’s still a lot I don’t know.
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_1000_1:
That’s why I keep battling a bunch of different
people—so I can understand dragon 
Pokémon better!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_1100_1:
If I don’t improve, I could end up repeating what
happened to me before. I definitely want to
avoid that!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0302_1400_1: Did you run into some trouble?
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0402_1500_1: Well...it’s kind of a long story.
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_1600_1: Did I ever tell you this before?
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_1700_1:
Before I became Champion, Grandpa Drayden
asked me if I wanted to try raising Deino.
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_1800_1:
And I said, “Yes, of course!” and started living
together with Deino right off the bat!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_1900_1:
But once she evolved into Hydreigon, she stopped
listening to me!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_2000_1:
My Hydreigon is known as a Brutal Pokémon. She’s
super strong and likes to rage out!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_2100_1:
So we used to fight a lot, and we went through
some rough times...
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_2200_1:
But then, Grandpa Drayden saw us struggling to
get along and asked me if I wanted to give up
trying to raise her.
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0401_2400_1: I said no way, of course!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0302_2500_1: But you didn’t give up, did you.
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_2700_1:
If you fight, all you have to do is make up! And
even more importantly, I wanted us to
be together!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_2800_1:
So it took some time, but I talked to Hydreigon a
lot...and that’s how we became friends with
each other!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_2900_1: Now you can even say we’re best friends!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_3000_1:
And I think I understand why Grandpa Drayden
gave me Deino! It was all a test.
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_3100_1:
What’s important is to keep on trying and never
give up!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_3200_1:
That’s not only true for Pokémon—it also applies
to Trainers!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_3300_1:
When you have a battle with someone, it helps
you understand how they think!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_3400_1:
That’s why I wanna keep battling a lot of different
sync pairs!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_1201_3500_1: I also wanna learn more about you, too!
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0401_3700_1: Yay! Why don’t we just have a battle now?
charaepi_ch0092_80_iris/2301_0402_3900_1: Yay! Then let’s get started! Here we go!
